name: datatables.net/datatables.net-fixedcolumns-bs
description: FixedColumns provides the ability to fix one or more columns to the left and / or right hand side of a DataTable that scrolls along the x-axis. This can be used if the columns show grouping, index or similar information. This is FixedColumns for DataTables with styling for [Bootstrap](https://getbootstrap.com/docs/3.3/)
